titles.title: Behold the Lord is my salvation

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
dm
Behold the Lord is my salvation
I will trust
and will not be afraid
For the Lord my God
is my strength and my song
He also has become my salvation

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Li li li li li li
Li li li li li li
Li li li li li li li li li li li li
(repeat )
